TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PolicyAssertionCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.Xml.XmlElement>
Public Class PolicyAssertionCollection Inherits Collection(Of XmlElement)

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection> class to group together policy assertions and to enumerate or modify a group of assertions.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection> is used most frequently as a return value for the methods of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> class.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
